item.title: Pentest - Windows Privilege Escalation
item.description: From Service to SYSTEM Service Account Privileges Services can be run such that they don’t maintain the privs of NT AUTHORITY\LOCAL SERVICE account, eg with the -k LocalServiceAndNoImpersonation option. The task scheduler can be used to restore default privs: FullPowers itm4n. After executing FullPowers:
